description.name: SMS.NET.BD - SMS Notification Plugin for WHMCS
description.tagline: Send Notifications to customers using sms.net.bd Gateway
description.long: The WHMCS SMS notification plugin for WHMCS is very useful, when you want to get notified via SMS after placing an order. Buyer and seller both can get SMS notification after an order is placed. SMS notification options can be customized in the admin panel very easily.
features: Notify clients when their orders are accepted
Keep administrators informed about successful logins
Inform clients of any changes to their hosting packages
Notify clients after a change in their hosting account password
Welcome a user, password change, upgrade, suspension or more
Send messages when a new hosting account is created
Alert clients when their hosting account is suspended
Inform clients of successful domain registrations
Alert administrators about failed domain registrations
Welcome new clients with an introductory SMS message
Notify administrators when a new client is added
Send SMS confirmations for client registrations
